00021    /*
00022    * Constructor.

00024    Buffer::Buffer() 
00025     : Util::ParamComposite(),
00026       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00027       sendBufferBegin_(0),
00028       recvBufferBegin_(0),
00029       sendBufferEnd_(0),
00030       recvBufferEnd_(0),

00032       recvBlockBegin_(0),
00033       sendPtr_(0),
00034       recvPtr_(0),

00051    /*
00052    * Allocate send and recv buffers.
00053    */
00054    void Buffer::allocate(int atomCapacity, int ghostCapacity)
00055    {
00056       //Preconditions
00057       if (atomCapacity < 0) {
00058          UTIL_THROW("Negative atomCapacity");
00059       }
00060       if (ghostCapacity < 0) {
00061          UTIL_THROW("Negative ghostCapacity");
00062       }
00063 
00064       atomCapacity_  = atomCapacity;
00065       ghostCapacity_ = ghostCapacity;
00066 
00067       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00068       // Do actual allocation
00069       allocate();
00070       #endif
00071 
00072       isInitialized_ = true;
00073    }
00074 
00075    /*
00076    * Read capacities, and allocate buffers.
00077    */
00078    void Buffer::readParam(std::istream& in)
00079    {
00080 
00081       // Read parameters
00082       readBegin(in, "Buffer");
00083       read<int>(in, "atomCapacity",  atomCapacity_);
00084       read<int>(in, "ghostCapacity", ghostCapacity_);
00085       readEnd(in);
00086 
00087       //Preconditions
00088       if (atomCapacity_ < 0) {
00089          UTIL_THROW("Negative atomCapacity");
00090       }
00091       if (ghostCapacity_ < 0) {
00092          UTIL_THROW("Negative ghostCapacity");
00093       }
00094 
00095       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00096       // Do actual allocation
00097       allocate();
00098       #endif
00099 
00100       isInitialized_ = true;
00101    }

00121    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00122    /*
00123    * Allocate send and recv buffers (private method).
00124    *
00125    * This method uses values of atomCapacity_ and ghostCapacity_ that 
00126    * must have been set previously. It is called by allocate(int, int) 
00127    * and readParam() to do the actual allocation. 
00128    */
00129    void Buffer::allocate()
00130    {
00131 
00132       // Preconditions
00133       if (atomCapacity_ <= 0) {
00134          UTIL_THROW("atomCapacity_ must be positive");
00135       }
00136       if (ghostCapacity_ <= 0) {
00137          UTIL_THROW("ghostCapacity_ must be positive");
00138       }
00139       if (isAllocated()) {
00140          UTIL_THROW("Buffer cannot be re-allocated");
00141       }
00142 
00143       // Capacity in bytes send and receive buffers. This is maximum of
00144       // the buffer space required by the local atoms and ghost atoms.
00145       int atomDataSize  = atomCapacity_*atomSize();
00146       int ghostDataSize = ghostCapacity_*ghostSize();
00147       if (atomDataSize > ghostDataSize) {
00148           dataCapacity_ = atomDataSize;
00149           ghostCapacity_ = dataCapacity_/ghostSize();
00150       } else {
00151           dataCapacity_ = ghostDataSize;
00152           atomCapacity_ = dataCapacity_/atomSize();
00153       }
00154 
00155       // Leave space for a 4 byte header
00156       bufferCapacity_ += dataCapacity_ + 4 * sizeof(int);
00157 
00158       // Allocate memory for the send buffer 
00159       sendBufferBegin_ = new char[bufferCapacity_];
00160       if (sendBufferBegin_ == 0) {
00161          UTIL_THROW("Error: memory not allocated for send buffer");
00162       }
00163       sendBufferEnd_ = sendBufferBegin_ + bufferCapacity_;
00164 
00165       // Allocate memory for the receive buffer
00166       recvBufferBegin_ = new char[bufferCapacity_];
00167       if (recvBufferBegin_ == 0) {
00168          UTIL_THROW("Error: memory not allocated for recv buffer");
00169       }
00170       recvBufferEnd_ = recvBufferBegin_ + bufferCapacity_;
00171 
00172       recvPtr_ = recvBufferBegin_;
00173    }
00174 
00175    /*
00176    * Clear the send buffer prior to packing, and set the sendType.
00177    */
00178    void Buffer::clearSendBuffer()
00179    { 
00180       sendPtr_ = sendBufferBegin_;
00181       sendSize_ = 0;
00182       sendType_ = NONE;
00183       sendBlockBegin_ = 0;
00184    }
00185 
00186    /*
00187    * Clear the send buffer prior to packing, and set the sendType.
00188    */
00189    void Buffer::beginSendBlock(BlockDataType sendType, int sendGroupSize)
00190    {
00191       if (sendSize_ != 0) {
00192          UTIL_THROW("Error: previous send block not finalized");
00193       }
00194 
00195       // Set number of atoms currently in send block to zero.
00196       sendSize_ = 0;
00197 
00198       // Data type to be sent.
00199       sendType_ = sendType;
00200       sendGroupSize_ = sendGroupSize; // 0 by default, for atom or ghost.
00201 
00202       // Mark beginning of block.
00203       sendBlockBegin_ = sendPtr_;
00204 
00205       // Increment sendPtr_ to leave space for 4 integers.
00206       int* sendBuffPtr = (int *)sendPtr_;
00207       sendBuffPtr += 4;
00208       sendPtr_ = (char *)sendBuffPtr;
00209 
00210    }
00211 
00212    /*
00213    * Finalize data block in buffer. Pack prefix data.
00214    */
00215    void Buffer::endSendBlock(bool isComplete)
00216    {
00217       // Add passport to the beginning of the block:
00218       // Pack sendSize_, sendType_ and isComplete.
00219       int* sendBuffPtr = (int *)sendBlockBegin_;
00220       *sendBuffPtr = sendSize_;
00221       ++sendBuffPtr;
00222       *sendBuffPtr = (int) sendType_;
00223       ++sendBuffPtr;
00224       *sendBuffPtr = sendGroupSize_;
00225       ++sendBuffPtr;
00226       *sendBuffPtr = (int) isComplete;
00227 
00228       // Clear variables associated with the sent block.
00229       sendBlockBegin_ = 0;
00230       sendSize_ = 0;
00231       sendType_ = NONE;
00232       sendGroupSize_ = 0;
00233 
00234    }
00235 
00236    /*
00237    * Begin receiving block. Extract prefix data. 
00238    */
00239    bool Buffer::beginRecvBlock()
00240    {
00241       // Precondition
00242       if (recvSize_ != 0) {
00243          UTIL_THROW("Error: Previous receive block not completely unpacked");
00244       }
00245 
00246       // Extract the number packed items and item type from the receive buffer
00247       int* recvBuffPtr = (int *)recvPtr_;
00248       recvSize_  = *recvBuffPtr;
00249       recvType_  = *(recvBuffPtr + 1);
00250       recvGroupSize_ = *(recvBuffPtr + 2);
00251       bool isComplete = (bool) *(recvBuffPtr + 3);
00252       recvBuffPtr += 4;
00253 
00254       // Set recvPtr to beginning of first item to be unpacked
00255       recvPtr_ = (char *)recvBuffPtr;
00256 
00257       return isComplete;
00258    }
00259 
00260    /*
00261    * Pack a local Atom for exchange of ownership.
00262    */
00263    void Buffer::packAtom(Atom& atom)
00264    {
00265       if (sendType_ != ATOM) {
00266          UTIL_THROW("Send type is not ATOM");
00267       }
00268       if (sendSize_ >= atomCapacity_) {
00269          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to overpack send buffer");
00270       }
00271 
00272       pack<int>(atom.id());
00273       pack<int>(atom.typeId());
00274       pack<Vector>(atom.position());
00275       pack<Vector>(atom.velocity());
00276       pack<unsigned int>(atom.plan().flags());
00277 
00278       // Pack Mask
00279       Mask& mask = atom.mask();
00280       int size = mask.size();
00281       pack<int>(size);
00282       for (int j = 0; j < size; ++j) {
00283          pack<int>(mask[j]);
00284       }
00285 
00286       //Increment number of atoms in send buffer by 1
00287       ++sendSize_;
00288    }
00289 
00290    /*
00291    * Receive ownership of an Atom.
00292    */
00293    void Buffer::unpackAtom(Atom& atom)
00294    {
00295       if (recvType_ != (int)ATOM) {
00296          UTIL_THROW("Receive type is not ATOM");
00297       }
00298       if (recvSize_ <= 0) {
00299          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to unpack empty receive buffer");
00300       }
00301 
00302       int i;
00303 
00304       unpack(i);
00305       atom.setId(i);
00306 
00307       unpack(i);
00308       atom.setTypeId(i);
00309 
00310       unpack<Vector>(atom.position());
00311       unpack<Vector>(atom.velocity());
00312 
00313       // Unpack communication plan
00314       unsigned int ui;
00315       unpack(ui);
00316       atom.plan().setFlags(ui);
00317 
00318       // Unpack atom Mask
00319       Mask& mask = atom.mask();
00320       mask.clear();
00321       int size;
00322       unpack(size);
00323       for (int j = 0; j < size; ++j) {
00324          unpack(i);
00325          mask.append(i);
00326       }
00327       assert(mask.size() == size);
00328 
00329       // Decrement number of atoms in recv buffer by 1
00330       recvSize_--;
00331 
00332    }
00333 
00334    /*
00335    * Return size of packed Atom, in bytes.
00336    */
00337    int Buffer::atomSize()
00338    {  
00339       int size = 0;
00340       size += 2*sizeof(int); 
00341       size += 2*sizeof(Vector); 
00342       size += sizeof(unsigned int);
00343       size += sizeof(int);
00344       size += Mask::Capacity*sizeof(int); 
00345       return size;
00346    }
00347 
00348    /*
00349    * Pack data required for a ghost Atom for sending.
00350    */
00351    void Buffer::packGhost(Atom& atom)
00352    {
00353       // Preconditions
00354       if (sendType_ != GHOST) {
00355          UTIL_THROW("Send type is not GHOST");
00356       }
00357       if (sendSize_ >= ghostCapacity_) {
00358          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to overpack send buffer");
00359       }
00360 
00361       Vector pos;
00362       pack<int>(atom.id());
00363       pack<int>(atom.typeId());
00364       pack<Vector>(atom.position());
00365       pack<unsigned int>(atom.plan().flags());
00366 
00367       //Increment number of atoms in send buffer by 1
00368       sendSize_++;
00369 
00370    }

00372    /*
00373    * Unpack data required for a ghost Atom.
00374    */
00375    void Buffer::unpackGhost(Atom& atom)
00376    {
00377       if (recvType_ != (int)GHOST) {
00378          UTIL_THROW("Receive type is not GHOST");
00379       }
00380       if (recvSize_ <= 0) {
00381          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to unpack empty receive buffer");
00382       }
00383 
00384       int i;
00385       unpack(i);
00386       atom.setId(i);
00387       unpack(i);
00388       atom.setTypeId(i);
00389       unpack<Vector>(atom.position());
00390 
00391       unsigned int ui;
00392       unpack(ui);
00393       atom.plan().setFlags(ui);
00394       
00395       //Decrement number of atoms in recv buffer to be unpacked by 1
00396       recvSize_--;
00397    }

00399    /*
00400    * Return size of one packed Ghost atom, in bytes (static method).
00401    */
00402    int Buffer::ghostSize()
00403    {  
00404       int size = 0;
00405       size += 2*sizeof(int); 
00406       size += sizeof(Vector); 
00407       size += sizeof(unsigned int);
00408       return size;
00409    }

00411    /*
00412    * Packed size of one Group<N> object.
00413    */
00414    int Buffer::groupSize(int N)
00415    {  return (2 + N)*sizeof(int) + sizeof(unsigned int); }
00416 
00417    /*
00418    * Maximum number of Group<N> objects that can fit buffer.
00419    */
00420    int Buffer::groupCapacity(int N) const
00421    {
00422       if (dataCapacity_ <= 0) {
00423          UTIL_THROW("Buffer not allocated");
00424       }
00425       return (dataCapacity_/groupSize(N)); 
00426    }

00428    /*
00429    * Pack updates ghost atom position.
00430    */
00431    void Buffer::packUpdate(Atom& atom)
00432    {
00433       // Preconditions
00434       if (sendType_ != UPDATE) {
00435          UTIL_THROW("Send type is not UPDATE");
00436       }
00437       if (sendSize_ >= ghostCapacity_) {
00438          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to overpack buffer: sendSize> >= ghostCapacity_");
00439       }
00440       pack<Vector>(atom.position());
00441 
00442       //Increment number of atoms in send buffer by 1
00443       sendSize_++;
00444    }

00449    void Buffer::unpackUpdate(Atom& atom)
00450    {
00451       if (recvType_ != (int)UPDATE) {
00452          UTIL_THROW("Receive type is not UPDATE");
00453       }
00454       if (recvSize_ <= 0) {
00455          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to unpack empty receive buffer");
00456       }
00457       unpack<Vector>(atom.position());
00458       
00459       //Decrement number of atoms in recv buffer to be unpacked by 1
00460       recvSize_--;
00461    }

00463    /*
00464    * Pack ghost atom force.
00465    */
00466    void Buffer::packForce(Atom& atom)
00467    {
00468       // Preconditions
00469       if (sendType_ != FORCE) {
00470          UTIL_THROW("Send type is not FORCE");
00471       }
00472       if (sendSize_ >= ghostCapacity_) {
00473          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to overpack buffer: sendSize> >= ghostCapacity_");
00474       }
00475       pack<Vector>(atom.force());
00476 
00477       //Increment number of atom forces in send buffer by 1
00478       sendSize_++;
00479    }
00480 
00484    void Buffer::unpackForce(Atom& atom)
00485    {
00486       if (recvType_ != (int)FORCE) {
00487          UTIL_THROW("Receive type is not FORCE");
00488       }
00489       if (recvSize_ <= 0) {
00490          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to unpack empty receive buffer");
00491       }
00492       Vector f;
00493       unpack<Vector>(f);
00494       atom.force() += f;
00495       
00496       //Decrement number of atoms in recv buffer to be unpacked by 1
00497       recvSize_--;
00498    }

00500    /*
00501    * Send and receive buffer.
00502    */
00503    void Buffer::sendRecv(MPI::Intracomm& comm, int source, int dest)
00504    {
00505 
00506       MPI::Request request[2];
00507       int  sendBytes = 0;
00508       int  myRank    = comm.Get_rank();
00509       int  comm_size = comm.Get_size();
00510 
00511       // Preconditions
00512       if (dest > comm_size - 1 || dest < 0) {
00513          UTIL_THROW("Destination rank out of bounds");
00514       }
00515       if (source > comm_size - 1 || source < 0) {
00516          UTIL_THROW("Source rank out of bounds");
00517       }
00518       if (dest == myRank) {
00519          UTIL_THROW("Destination and my rank are identical");
00520       }
00521       if (source == myRank) {
00522          UTIL_THROW("Source and my rank are identical");
00523       }
00524 
00525       // Start nonblocking receive.
00526       request[0] = comm.Irecv(recvBufferBegin_, bufferCapacity_ , 
00527                               MPI::CHAR, source, 5);
00528 
00529       // Start nonblocking send.
00530       sendBytes = sendPtr_ - sendBufferBegin_;
00531       request[1] = comm.Isend(sendBufferBegin_, sendBytes , MPI::CHAR, dest, 5);
00532 
00533       // Wait for completion of receive.
00534       request[0].Wait();
00535       recvPtr_ = recvBufferBegin_;
00536 
00537       // Wait for completion of send.
00538       request[1].Wait();
00539 
00540    }
00541 
00542    /*
00543    * Send a buffer.
00544    */
00545    void Buffer::send(MPI::Intracomm& comm, int dest)
00546    {
00547       MPI::Request request;
00548       int  sendBytes = 0;
00549       int  comm_size = comm.Get_size();
00550       int  myRank = comm.Get_rank();
00551 
00552       // Preconditions
00553       if (dest > comm_size - 1 || dest < 0) {
00554          UTIL_THROW("Destination rank out of bounds");
00555       }
00556       if (dest == myRank) {
00557          UTIL_THROW("Source and destination identical");
00558       }
00559 
00560       sendBytes = sendPtr_ - sendBufferBegin_;
00561       request = comm.Isend(sendBufferBegin_, sendBytes, MPI::CHAR, dest, 5);
00562       request.Wait();
00563    }
00564 
00565    /*
00566    * Receive a buffer.
00567    */
00568    void Buffer::recv(MPI::Intracomm& comm, int source)
00569    {
00570       MPI::Request request;
00571       int  myRank     = comm.Get_rank();
00572       int  comm_size  = comm.Get_size();
00573 
00574       // Preconditons
00575       if (source > comm_size - 1 || source < 0) {
00576          UTIL_THROW("Source rank out of bounds");
00577       }
00578       if (source == myRank) {
00579          UTIL_THROW("Source and destination identical");
00580       }
00581 
00582       request = comm.Irecv(recvBufferBegin_, bufferCapacity_, 
00583                            MPI::CHAR, source, 5);
00584       request.Wait();
00585       recvType_ = NONE;
00586       recvPtr_ = recvBufferBegin_;
00587 
00588    }
00589 
00590    /*
00591    * Broadcast a buffer.
00592    */
00593    void Buffer::bcast(MPI::Intracomm& comm, int source)
00594    {
00595       int comm_size = comm.Get_size();
00596       int myRank = comm.Get_rank();
00597       if (source > comm_size - 1 || source < 0) {
00598          UTIL_THROW("Source rank out of bounds");
00599       }
00600 
00601       int sendBytes;
00602       if (myRank == source) {
00603          sendBytes = sendPtr_ - sendBufferBegin_;
00604          comm.Bcast(&sendBytes, 1, MPI::INT, source);
00605          comm.Bcast(sendBufferBegin_, sendBytes, MPI::CHAR, source);
00606          sendPtr_ = sendBufferBegin_;
00607          sendType_ = NONE;
00608       } else {
00609          comm.Bcast(&sendBytes, 1, MPI::INT, source);
00610          comm.Bcast(recvBufferBegin_, sendBytes, MPI::CHAR, source);
00611          recvPtr_ = recvBufferBegin_;
00612          recvType_ = NONE;
00613       }
00614 
00615    }

00626    int Buffer::recvSize() const

00629    /*
00630    * Has this buffer been allocated?
00631    */
00632    bool Buffer::isAllocated() const
00633    {  return (bufferCapacity_ > 0); }
